meta_description: Explore exhibition gallery guides, videos, articles, and more.
hours_text:
# We’re excited for your visit!

Welcome to the Sioux City Art Center! We look forward to greeting you on our campus in downtown Sioux City. Whether you would like to discover new artwork in an [upcoming exhibition](/exhibitions/#upcoming-exhibitions), visit one of your favorites from the [Permanent Collection](/permanent-collection), or create your own masterpiece in a [youth](/youth-programs) or [adult](/adult-programs) class, we have something for everyone!

[Check Out Our Museum Tours ](/tours)

# We’re excited for your visit!

Welcome to the Sioux City Art Center! We look forward to greeting you on our campus in downtown Sioux City. Whether you would like to discover new artwork in an [upcoming exhibition](/exhibitions/#upcoming-exhibitions), visit one of your favorites from the [Permanent Collection](/permanent-collection), or create your own masterpiece in a [youth](/youth-programs) or [adult](/adult-programs) class, we have something for everyone!

[Check Out Our Museum Tours ](/tours)

## Contact

### Connect with the Sioux City Art Center

We love hearing from our community! Please contact us with any questions or feedback you may have for us; one of our staff members will review your message and respond as needed.

#### Location

[225 Nebraska Street  
Sioux City, Iowa 51101-1712](https://www.google.com/maps?ll=42.49278,-96.403985&z=17&t=m&hl=en&gl=US&mapclient=embed&daddr=Sioux+City+Art+Center+225+Nebraska+St+Sioux+City,+IA+51101@42.4927804,-96.4039852)
